page.description: The Switch to Another (non-Alpha Anywhere) Window action sets focus to another non-Alpha Anywhere window. If you want to send keystrokes to the target window after it gets focus, use the Send Keys action.

step.description: Specify how to select the target window. The options are:
If you selected "Specify Window name now", pick the window from the Window Name field.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.
